module.name: Day Night Mode
module.description: Day / Night control - allows for two destinations to be chosen and provides a feature code that toggles between the two destinations.
module.changelog: *1.0.2.1* added xml attribute needsenginedb, fixed some undefined vars *1.0.2* Added red/green color coding of rnav to see current mode *1.0.1* #2047 got day/night reversed *1.0.0* First release for FreePBX 2.3
